bibl.title: Jewish Law and Hellenistic Legal Practice in the Light of Greek Papyri from Egypt.
bibl.note: Également publié dans: N.S. HECHT, B.S. JACKSON, S.M. PASSAMANECK, D. PIATTELLI and A.M. RABELLO (Edd.), An Introduction to the History and Sources of Jewish Law (Oxford, 1996) pp. 75-99.
bibl.seg: MODRZEJEWSKI (MÉLÈZE MODRZEJEWSKI) Joseph, Jewish Law and Hellenistic Legal Practice in the Light of Greek Papyri from Egypt.

R. FEENSTRA, A.S. HARTKAMP, J.E. SPRUIT, P.J. SIJPESTEIJN, L.C. WINKEL (Édd.), Collatio iuris Romani. Études dédiées à Hans Ankum à l'occasion de son 65e anniversaire = Studia Amstelodamensia ad epigraphicam, ius antiquum et papyrologicam pertinentia. XXXV (Amsterdam, 1995) pp. 299-315.
Également publié dans: N.S. HECHT, B.S. JACKSON, S.M. PASSAMANECK, D. PIATTELLI and A.M. RABELLO (Edd.), An Introduction to the History and Sources of Jewish Law (Oxford, 1996) pp. 75-99.
